tool_description: Our algorithm uses a mixture of techniques for improving the quality of pictures. It works by adding detail to the pictures and makes the resolution 4 times higher as well.
name: Image enhancement - quality and resolution
title: Image enhancement - quality and resolution

api_list.name: enhance image
api_list.description:
This endpoint is where you can send your image files for them to be processed and then delivered back to you!

You can switch between face = 1 and face = 2 for our different face enhancement algorithms, the default is 1.

Accepted file formats are .jpg, .jpeg,  .png (not transparent background - it will get replaced with black)

A binary file is returned. (the improved image)
